thread.title: Samsung Galaxy S6 and Galaxy S6 Edge Receiving Android 5.1.1 Lollipop Update at Verizon

title: Samsung Galaxy S6 and Galaxy S6 Edge Receiving Android 5.1.1 Lollipop Update at Verizon
text: Samsung Galaxy S6 and Galaxy S6 Edge Receiving Android 5.1.1 Lollipop Update at Verizon Thursday, 3 September 2015 (21 minutes ago) Samsung has already kicked off the rollout of Android 5.1.1 Lollipop upgrade for Galaxy S6 and Galaxy S6 edge, but, as expected, US-based carrier Verizon is late to the party. The Big Red announced today that there's a new software update available for the Samsung Galaxy S6 edge and Galaxy S6. Owners of these smartphones will be pleased to know that this is in fact the highly anticipated Android 5.1.1 Lollipop update. According to the Samsung’s new duo are the best Android phablets yet. The question is, do you want a stylus or curved screen? Photo: Jason Henry for The Wall Street Journal Copyright 2015, Dow Jones & Company, Inc.
